name: slackPostMessage

metadata.description:
slackPostMessage Sensor


Sends a message to a Slack channel or user. To use this actuator, the connection with slack should be configured in your settings under connections.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed
Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • channel: Channel, private group, or IM channel to send message to. Can be an encoded ID, or a name
  • text: The message that will be sent
